Constructor Detail

SlotPathImp

public SlotPathImp(SequencePath sequencePath,
                   Backbone backbone,
                   SlotTranslator slotTranslator,
                   int slot)
Creates a new SlotPath around the passed data.

Parameters:
sequencePath - The SequencePath used to perform the underlying translations on the sequence.
backbone - The backbone used to perform the underlying translations of points.
slotTranslator - A SlotTranslator used to translate to different heights given slot numbers.
slot - The slot about which we will be creating paths.

lineTo

public void lineTo(double base,
                   double heightInSlot,
                   Direction direction,
                   SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Description copied from interface: SlotPath
Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.

Specified by:
lineTo in interface SlotPath
Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot (0 = center) (-1 to 1)
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.
orientation - The orientation of the line.

lineTo

public void lineTo(double base,
                   double heightInSlot,
                   double lengthFromBase,
                   Direction direction,
                   SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Description copied from interface: SlotPath
Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).

Specified by:
lineTo in interface SlotPath
Parameters:
base - The base pair value to draw to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.
orientation - The orientation of the line.
